title: Roosevelt Corollary to Monroe Doctrine - justified

content.question: The Roosevelt Corollary to the Monroe Doctrine justified which of the following?

choices.label: Rooseveltâ€™s involvement in settling the Russo-Japanese War
The policy of using force to subdue the independence movement in the Philippines
The maintenance of the Open Door policy in China
The right to intervene in the domestic affairs of Latin American countries
The exclusion of Japanese and Chinese immigrants from the United States

content.answer: The right to intervene in the domestic affairs of Latin American countries

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
